name: NINJA KATO 3
description:
【third In the Ninja kato Series!】

A Side-scrolling 2d Action Game.
Robot Ninja kato's Training Is Only Halfway Done.

This time's training is a competition of running ability with the master!
Follow the ninja master while avoiding oncoming cannonballs and kunai!
Continue running by using the items found along the course!
Overcome various obstacles and receive the master's approval!

After clearing all stages, Kato will take on an even more difficult stage.
When all training is completed, Kato will make new history!

【ITEMS】

There are four items that support Kato.
Stop time, increase running power, and become invincible.
There are also items that can be obtained through roulette.

【BIRD】

If Kato grabs the bird and moves, he can aim for a one-shot reversal.
If the roulette wheel spins, there's a chance a bird will appear.
